  body: {
    aggs: {
      actors: {
        terms: {
          field: 'actors',
          size: 10,
          collect_mode: 'breadth_first'
        },
        aggs: {
          costars: {
            terms: {
              field: 'actors',
              size: 5
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
